channel.title: Admin issue
channel.description: Hellow i am having a problem with my admin thing i remember a kid telling me that to make somebody admin its usually in client.java where else could i find it? because i goto crlt-f and type in my username i logged in with and it couldn't find it :(

item.title: Admin issue
item.dc:creator: @Emchie Emchie
item.description:
@Emchie wrote:

If its a 317 Server, go to the Character files. Then open up your username.
Look for PlayerRights

Change it to whatever you want.

4 = Hidden Admin
3 = Owner
2 = Admin
1 = Mod
0 = Normal

If its 503+ then go to Player.class or Player.cfg or whatever its called.
Press Ctrl + F and search for the username of the original owner, and change that to your username.

PS. I just said what “yourusername” said, but in more detail.

Read full topic
